name: Timestamp Normalizer Processor
description: Floors a given timestamp, based on the time fields; e.g. floored to the nearest 10 minutes.

parameters.name: datetime_format
parameters.description: The datetime format to parse the given field with.

parameters.name: datetime_field
parameters.description: The field which contains a formatted datetime, a datetime object, or a long timestamp.

parameters.name: datetime_locale
parameters.description: The locale of the datetime format to parse the field with.

parameters.name: years
parameters.description: Floor the timestamp to the nearest time frame. Only takes largest unit into account, so if 10 years and 10 hours is present, only 10 years is used.

parameters.name: months
parameters.description: Floor the timestamp to the nearest time frame. Only takes largest unit into account, so if 10 years and 10 hours is present, only 10 years is used.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Floor the timestamp to the nearest time frame. Only takes largest unit into account, so if 10 years and 10 hours is present, only 10 years is used.

parameters.name: hours
parameters.description: Floor the timestamp to the nearest time frame. Only takes largest unit into account, so if 10 years and 10 hours is present, only 10 years is used.

parameters.name: minutes
parameters.description: Floor the timestamp to the nearest time frame. Only takes largest unit into account, so if 10 years and 10 hours is present, only 10 years is used.

parameters.name: seconds
parameters.description: Floor the timestamp to the nearest time frame. Only takes largest unit into account, so if 10 years and 10 hours is present, only 10 years is used.

parameters.name: millis
parameters.description: Floor the timestamp to the nearest time frame. Only takes largest unit into account, so if 10 years and 10 hours is present, only 10 years is used.
